meanings.definition: In a manner that does not cause pain or discomfort.
meanings.sent2: The dentist extracted the tooth painlessly.
meanings.sent3: The cat took its medicine painlessly, surprising everyone.
meanings.sent4: The software update painlessly fixed all the bugs.
meanings.sent5: The new pain relief cream worked painlessly and quickly.

meanings.sent1: The painlessly surgery left no scars.
meanings.sent2: The painlessly process made the recovery easier.
meanings.sent3: The painlessly spa treatment was a relaxing experience.
meanings.sent4: The painlessly solution to the problem was unexpected.
meanings.sent5: The painlessly journey through the forest was serene and beautiful.
